abstract: Elliott Management has made strides in its latest activist campaign against a technology company, as BMC Software has retained Bank of America Merrill Lynch to explore a potential sale of itself, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Monday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Elliott's Campaign Against BMC Advances as Company Explores a Sale
